alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island North; Big Island Southeast; Kahoolawe; Kohala; Lanai Leeward; Lanai Mauka; Lanai South; Lanai Windward; Maui Central Valley South; Maui Leeward West; Maui Windward West (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 25 at 8:47AM HST until November 25 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST TODAY FOR A PORTION OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with localized gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Lanai, Kahoolawe, Maui and the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST today. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and awnings and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.
